amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal laws pertaining to Medicaid.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to exempt from the provisions of the bill those laws and regulations pertaining to Medicaid. (Text of the amendment was printed as amendment No. 155 in the Congressional Record of January 20, 1995.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 295 (Roll no. 66).
